The '''Sumeru Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Sumeru]], allowing players to access the [[chests]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Sumeru.

There are 10 Sumeru Shrine of Depths Keys (9 obtainable as of Version 3.4), which allow the player to open all shrines in the [[Lokapala Jungle]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Ashavan Realm]], [[Vissudha Field]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Desert of Hadramaveth]] areas of Sumeru.
